bulletin.title: A goblin with a fancy hat swaggers into town
message: Hahaha!! Your puny settlement now part of Glittering Territory! Ah-peeze me with shinies!
Human Peons! You no understand the might of the Glittering Army! You lucky to bow before me. Also, want some things to hold to at night; to sing me to sleep.
You got supplies? We take; we good. We have understanding?
Hahahah, you the new kid in the great Red Territory. This means me less-new-kid take your lunch. Lunch metaphor.  You make for us. Or else.
You dumb bok, me big Glittering Chieftain! Natural order mean you give me stuff and I no dees-tro-i you. Me want supplies. Understand?

bulletin.title: Appease the Goblins
bulletin.message: I'll be back for my stuff. Better have it, or no good for you hearthling.

bulletin.title: The goblin stomps back into town
bulletin.message: Glittering Army returns! Where iz stuff?

bulletin.title: The goblin looks incredulous
bulletin.message: You forgot stuff? You no make? You stain Glittering Army Honor! You die now!

bulletin.title: The goblin looks incredulous
bulletin.message: What? You say no? Then we take! TAKE ALL THINGS!!!!
